column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My first time in Bavette
column2: even though I like steaks in Chicago. We could not make a reservation for Monday which was surprising
column4: we walked in and got a table. The restaurant was full on Monday all night long
column5: we had a great  dinner: the food was good
column6: wine list was decent even though not a long one. Asparagus side tasted very good but in general food was a little bit  over salted
column7: I ordered RIbeye steak CHICAGO cut
column8: it was very tasty but overstated. Another guest ordered lamb which was Colorado lamb!
